doc.title: Overland Flyer
doc.plot: Showing a scene at the depot in La Junta, Colo., upon the arrival of the famous Overland Flyer of the A., T, & S. F.; shows the people alighting, the baggage truck being loaded, the engineer leaving engine to receive orders, the people clambering aboard, the conductor's signal to start, and then -- they leave --something new, fine.
